channel.title: GitHub Solidity Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Solidity in GitHub

item.title: AmazingAng/WTF-Solidity
item.description: WTF Solidity 极简入门教程，供小白们使用。Now supports English! 官网: https://wtf.academy

item.title: foundry-rs/forge-std
item.description: Forge Standard Library is a collection of helpful contracts for use with forge and foundry. It leverages forge's cheatcodes to make writing tests easier and faster, while improving the UX of cheatcodes. For more in-depth usage examples checkout the tests.

item.title: OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts
item.description: OpenZeppelin Contracts is a library for secure smart contract development.

item.title: Uniswap/v2-periphery
item.description: 🎚 Peripheral smart contracts for interacting with Uniswap V2

item.title: OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-foundry-upgrades
item.description: Foundry library for deploying and managing upgradeable contracts

item.title: dmfxyz/murky
item.description: Merkle Proof Generator and Validator in Solidity

item.title: Uniswap/v4-periphery
item.description: 🦄 🦄 🦄 🦄 Peripheral smart contracts for interacting with Uniswap v4

item.title: l2beat/l2beat
item.description: L2BEAT is an analytics and research website about Ethereum layer two (L2) scaling solutions.

item.title: GNSPS/solidity-bytes-utils
item.description: Utility Solidity library composed of basic operations for tightly packed bytes arrays

item.title: smartcontractkit/chainlink-brownie-contracts
item.description: A repository for automatically using the latest chainlink repo from the core chainlink repo.

item.title: Dapp-Learning-DAO/Dapp-Learning
item.description: Dapp learning project for developers at all stages. Becoming and cultivating sovereign individuals. Nonprofit organization.
